actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to increase to full annuities the reduced civil service retirement annuities of certain employees who retired before July 18, 1966.

summary.text: Increases to full annuities the reduced civil service retirement annuities of employees who retired before July 18, 1966, who if retired after July 17, 1966, would have retired on full annuity because they had attained 55 years of age and 30 years of service.

titles.title: A bill to increase to full annuities the reduced civil service retirement annuities of certain employees who retired before July 18, 1966.
